controllers

Class GUIDataController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.GUIDataController

  • public class GUIDataController
extends java.lang.Object
    The gui data controller that will fetch data from the game, for creating the GUI visuals.
    Author:
    tom

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GUIDataController(PlayerDataBase playerDB, GuiGrid grid)
      Create a new gui data controller.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIDataController

        public GUIDataController(PlayerDataBase playerDB,
                 GuiGrid grid)
        Create a new gui data controller.
        Parameters:
        playerDB - The player database the controller will use.
        grid - The grid the controller will use. This may be null, but then one has to call the #setGrid(Grid) method later.

    • Method Detail

      • hasGrid

        public boolean hasGrid()
        Check if the gui data controller is configured with a grid.
        Returns:
        True if this data controller is linked to a grid.

        Set the grid of the controller to a new grid.
        Parameters:
        grid - The new grid for this controller

        Get the square at a certain coordinate on the grid.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
